response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs and goals. This exceptional product carries a value of $1,000,000 to me, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a favorable discount. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if there's any way I can provide more information to help you make an informed decision.", "product_price": 950000}
